course_description: Elementary course covering the principles of mechanics, heat, thermodynamics, and wave motion. Methods of calculus are introduced and used where appropriate. Four hours of lecture and one three-hour laboratory per week.
prerequisites: This mandates Math_OX 111 or Math_OX 110 as prerequisites.
